data.title: Cilento Vacation Rentals and Airbnb
data.meta_description: Looking for Cilento Vacation Rental? Find the best deals with verified reviews on cozycozy. Book a Rental for cheap Today!

Azienda Agrituristica Salella

farm - Salento

Azienda Agrituristica Salella is located in the Salento region, offering mountain views and is a short drive from local landmarks. The farm has received very good ratings for cleanliness and user experience, with a good location rating.

The accommodation features a private patio for each unit, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the fresh air. Guests can enjoy on-site dining with authentic Italian cuisine, take advantage of free Wi-Fi and parking, and relax in the garden or shared lounge area.

9.7Excellent 38 reviews

Casa Vacanze Cilento

cottage - Gioi

This charming cottage is situated in the Cilento National Park, just a short distance from the seaside town of Casal Velino Ascea and within easy reach of Palinuro and Marina di Camerota. The property has consistently received excellent reviews for its location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

The cottage has one bedroom and one bathroom, comfortably accommodating up to four guests. The property offers a fully equipped kitchen, internet access, parking, and a spacious porch for enjoying the peaceful surroundings.

10Excellent 1 review

apartment - Laurino

Services and facilities: a washing machine, free parking and air conditioning.

2 Bedrooms House With City View And Wifi At Laurino

house - Laurino

This house is situated in a quiet residential district of Laurino, just a short walk from the town centre and a 15-minute drive (24 km) from the beach. It has received excellent ratings for cleanliness, location and user experience.

The property features a private entrance, dressing room and one bathroom, accommodating up to five guests. It includes a fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen, a washing machine, air conditioning, a terrace, a garden, a jacuzzi, a spa, a restaurant, valet parking and free private parking.

Carretiello

farm - Roccadaspide

Carretiello farm stay is located in Roccadaspide, 45km from the Pertosa Caves, offering a peaceful retreat in the heart of the countryside. The property enjoys excellent ratings for cleanliness, location and overall experience.

The accommodation comprises a single bedroom with a private bathroom, complete with a private terrace for outdoor enjoyment. Guests can benefit from a range of amenities including a shared lounge, a garden, a restaurant and free Wi-Fi, as well as a daily Italian breakfast.

Simona Boutique Villa

house - Salento

This spacious villa is located in the [District Name] area of Salento, just a short drive from the beautiful beaches of [Beach Name] and close to the historic town of [Town Name]. The property has been highly rated by previous guests, with excellent scores for location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

This five-bedroom property can comfortably accommodate up to nine guests, making it ideal for families or groups of friends. The villa boasts a range of amenities, including a private swimming pool, a terrace, a garden, and a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for enjoying the warm Salento weather and exploring the local area.

Iumara Dimora Di Campagna

resort - Omignano

Iumara Dimora Di Campagna is situated in the picturesque village of Omignano Scale, a short drive from the charming coastal town of Amalfi and the stunning ruins of Pompeii. The resort has received excellent user ratings for cleanliness and location, with guests praising its tranquil countryside setting.

The property offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a lush garden, and a relaxing shared lounge and terrace. Guests can enjoy delicious Italian dishes at the on-site restaurant, benefit from room service, a concierge service, and free WiFi throughout the property.

10Excellent 3 reviews

Cilento

Bellissima Villa Nel Cilento - Castel San Lorenzo

house - Castel San Lorenzo

La Ginestra is situated in Castel San Lorenzo, within the Cilento National Park, a short drive from the town centre, offering a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle. The property has received excellent ratings for its location, cleanliness and overall user experience.

The house has eight bedrooms, each with a private bathroom, comfortably accommodating up to 16 guests. La Ginestra offers modern amenities like air conditioning, Wi-Fi, and a private TV in each room, as well as a garden, parking, and a dedicated play area for children.

10Excellent 1 review

Il Casale Della Fonte

apartment - Gioi

This two-bedroom apartment is situated in the Cilento National Park, overlooking a valley above the sea near Velia, and is within easy reach of the beaches of Ascea, Camerota, Palinuro, and Agropoli, all within 50km. The apartment has received excellent ratings for its location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

The property is spread over two floors and can comfortably accommodate up to six guests. It features a fully equipped kitchen, a living room, two bathrooms, and a private garden with a terrace, perfect for enjoying the stunning views and peaceful surroundings.

Azienda Agricola Passaro

farm - Trentinara

Azienda Agricola Passaro is located in Trentinara, a town in the Cilento National Park, approximately 120 kilometres from Naples International Airport. The farm enjoys excellent ratings for location, cleanliness and overall experience.

The property offers a range of accommodation options, each with private terraces and access to a shared infinity pool with stunning sea views. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi, private parking, and a garden, making it the perfect base for exploring the region.

9.2Excellent 10 reviews

Tre Metr Sopra Il Cielo '' Girasoli''

apartment - Felitto

This apartment is situated in Felitto, a charming village in the Cilento National Park, just 50 kilometres from the renowned Contursi Hot Springs. It has received excellent ratings for its location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

The one-bedroom apartment spans 30 square metres and comfortably accommodates up to four guests. It features a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning, a terrace, a garden, a swimming pool, and a restaurant and bar on-site, offering a range of amenities and activities for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Cozy Home In Giungano With Wi-fi

house - Giungano

This comfortable home is located in Giungano, a charming village in the Italian countryside, just 117 kilometres from Naples International Airport. The village boasts a peaceful atmosphere and is perfect for those seeking a relaxing getaway.

This four-bedroom property offers 184 square metres of space, comfortably accommodating up to 10 guests. The house features a range of modern amenities, including a fully equipped kitchen, a private pool, a jacuzzi, and a fireplace for cosy evenings.

#3mtsoprailcielo '' Sculpture ''

apartment - Felitto

This apartment is situated in Felitto, a charming village in the Cilento National Park, just a 40-kilometre drive from the Amalfi Coast's beautiful beaches. This makes it an ideal base for exploring the region's natural beauty and cultural attractions.

The one-bedroom flat spans 30 square metres and comfortably accommodates up to five guests. It features a kitchen, a terrace, a garden, a swimming pool, a spa, a concierge service, a restaurant, a bar, and parking.

$174/nighttotal: $1218 (7 )

Dimora Storica Cilentana Nel Cuore Del Parco

castle - Felitto

This castle is located in Felitto, a village in the Cilento National Park, just 60km from the Amalfi Coast and 80km from Pompeii. The surrounding area offers stunning views of the Gole del Calore and the hills, providing a peaceful setting for a relaxing getaway.

This historic dwelling is spread over two levels and can accommodate up to four guests. The castle has three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a garden, making it ideal for families or groups of friends.

Villa Andrea E Martina

house - Trentinara

This country house is located just a short drive from the charming village centre of Trentinara, offering a peaceful retreat in the countryside. The property has received very good ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall user experience.

The house has five bedrooms and three bathrooms, comfortably accommodating up to thirteen guests. It features a well-equipped kitchen, a Jacuzzi, a large garden with a basketball court and barbecue, and a rumpus room with table tennis and table football.

Agriturismo Nonno Ninuccio

farm - Gioi

Agriturismo Nonno Ninuccio is situated in Gioi, a charming village in the Cilento National Park, approximately 146 kilometres from Naples International Airport. The farm enjoys excellent ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall guest experience.

The property offers a one-bedroom, one-bathroom accommodation with a capacity of three guests. Amenities include a peaceful garden, a balcony with views, free Wi-Fi, a terrace, a restaurant serving delicious Italian cuisine, packed lunches for excursions, a private entrance, a buffet breakfast, and a flat-screen TV.
